Priestess of Light Razen:
The power you attained through Awakening - it is great power, yes, but it is the power of the Giants. Skills in particular are the essence of the Giants' abilities.
But for Triol the devil, the greatest weapon would be the power of the light bestowed by Einhasad the goddess.
No need to look disappointed or regret Awakening, however. Excluding skills and servitors' abilities, all of your general attacks are imbued with the power of the light inside you. They will be critical in defeating the pagans.
